room_title: Escape room "A.I. Rebellion" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: We played AI Rebellion, and we escaped! Great non-traditional type of escape room game, not so many lockers (which require a key to open) like other places, I feel they are higher technology type of escape room.Compared to other places, I do like private rooms, no strangers, less distractions, and you can just focus on the game! I loved the costume provided.We will definitely come back for more games!

room_title: Escape room "A.I. Rebellion" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: Had a great times with friends. We saved the world from a deadly AI! Staff were great, place looked great, and the rooms were filled with awesome challenges. Would go again in a heart beat.

room_title: Escape room "A.I. Rebellion" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: My wife and I just finished the AI Rebellion (with 4 minutes left) and had a great time. The staff was friendly and the game was challenging but feasible. My wife and I look forward to experiencing their other 3 rooms soon!

room_title: Escape room "A.I. Rebellion" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: Tested out the AI Rebellion room - we had a great time. Staff was awesome.

room_title: Escape room "A.I. Rebellion" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: Went there with two of my friends. Staff was very friendly. We've tested the AI Rebellion room and had lots of fun solving the riddles in time. If you love escape rooms, try them. I will definitely come back to Brain Drain!
